imdb.title: Renai Flops
imdb.plot: Asahi Kashiwagi lives the normal life of a high school student until one day a TV fortune teller's predictions come true one after another. Fate ties his life and five beautiful girls together. But one day something happens.

episodes.title: Don't Get So Grabby, You Clumsy Oaf!
episodes.plot: Asahi, who goes to high school after a strange fortune telling in a TV show, realizes that the fortune teller's predictions are true and the lives of the 5 beautiful girls who have come to this high school and him are intertwined.

episodes.title: I Figure We All Have Our Own Pleasures and Predilections
episodes.plot:
Know what this is about?
 Be the first one to add a plot.

episodes.title: No! Not There! Not Like That!
episodes.plot: Emelia, who recently came to Japan from America, is weak in writing Japanese. Asahi, who realizes this, decides to help her, but in the meantime, he faces ups and downs.

episodes.title: Wow! It's Huge!
episodes.plot: Strangely, Asahi and his 5 friends win a trip in a lottery. In the middle of the trip, Ilya is afraid that his secret will be revealed, so he does everything to keep his secret hidden.

episodes.title: A Bone-Shakingly Fine Woman
episodes.plot: Mongfa, who is now a teacher, is in charge of educating teenagers, suddenly one day her dark past comes to her and she gets involved in a dangerous adventure. In the meantime, Asahi gets involved in this story.

episodes.title: No Balls! N-No D!!! Either...
episodes.plot: Karin, who is a German model and has now come to Japan, is given a heavy duty by a supernatural being. Asahi, who realizes this, helps him to stop those who want to stop the continuation of the human race.

episodes.title: I'll Charge a Snooze Fee
episodes.plot: Asahi and his friends decide to go to the beach. After spending a good time together, they suddenly disappear on the way back.

episodes.title: You Hate Me Getting You up Early, but You Get Annoyed When I Leave It Too Late as Well
episodes.plot: Asahi wakes up like every day and goes to high school. When he reaches high school, he finds that everything has changed and he can't find his friends. In the meantime, a doctor enters and makes Asahi suspicious with her words.

episodes.title: Your Mom's Inviting You for Some Baby Roleplay
episodes.plot: Now that Asahi realized that all these events were not real and only in his digital dream, he returned to the real world and became depressed. But he realized that all digital tools are broken and he is the solution to this problem.

episodes.title: Yup, It's Risky to Go In Raw, Rubber
episodes.plot: With Yoshino's help, Asahi returns to the digital world. Meanwhile, the company starts erasing data, which causes Asahi and the other 4 girls to confront the erasing program, when suddenly something happens.

episodes.title: I'm Glad I Got to Meet You
episodes.plot: Asahi and the others are going through the doors to get to the center of the system, meanwhile they are fighting the data eraser program.

episodes.title: Could You At Least Put Some Undies On?
episodes.plot: Asahi finds Ai and talks to her, then returns to the real world. After a few days, Yoshino suddenly sends Asahi some packages that.
